text: The 1881 Lewisburg football team represented the University of Lewisburg—now known as Bucknell University—during the 1881 college football season. In the schools first-ever game, it lost to Penn State. ==Schedule== ==References== Lewisburg Category:Bucknell Bison football seasons Category:College football winless seasons Lewisburg football
title: 1881 Lewisburg football team
